cheatsheet.title: Creating a new plot in Debrief

intro.description: This tutorial will lead you through creating a new, blank plot in Debrief.

item.title: Check you have a Project
item.description: Before you can create a Plot, you must have a Project into which the Plot is created. If you haven't created a project, go to the "Generating a project" cheatsheet, then return here.

item.title: Create new plot
item.description: Select [File/New/Debrief Plot] and the Wizard will open.

item.title: Add background data
item.description: From the wizard, follow the series of tabs to indicate what information you'd like shown in the background of the plot, clicking Finish to complete.
